```{r setup}
library(quickcheck)
library(testthat)
```

```{r}
# sum

test_that("sum always returns a scalar number", {
  for_all(
    x = numeric_(len = c(1, 10)),
    property = \(x) sum(x) |> length() |> expect_equal(1)
  )
})

test_that("sum with a number and zero equals the number", {
  for_all(
    x = numeric_(),
    y = constant(0),
    property = \(x, y) sum(c(x, y)) |> expect_equal(x)
  )
})

# rev

test_that("reverse of reverse equals the input", {
  for_all(
    x = any_vector(),
    property = \(x) rev(x) |> rev() |> expect_equal(x)
  )
})
```
